t: Psalm 136
Give*pn thanks to the Lord,*s for he is good. His*lg love endures forever.
Give*pn thanks to the God of gods. His*lg love endures forever.
Give*pn thanks to the Lord of lords: His*lg love endures forever.
to*pn him who alone does great wonders, His*lg love endures forever.
who*pn by his understanding made the heavens, His*lg love endures forever.
who*pn spread out the earth upon the waters, His*lg love endures forever.
who*pn made the great lights— His*lg love endures forever.
the*pn sun to govern the day, His*lg love endures forever.
the*pn moon and stars to govern the night; His*lg love endures forever.
to*pn him who struck down the firstborn of Egypt His*lg love endures forever.
and*pn brought Israel out from among them His*lg love endures forever.
with*pn a mighty hand and outstretched arm; His*lg love endures forever.
to*pn him who divided the Red Sea asunder His*lg love endures forever.
and*pn brought Israel through the midst of it, His*lg love endures forever.
but*pn swept Pharaoh and his army into the Red Sea; His*lg love endures forever.
to*pn him who led his people through the wilderness; His*lg love endures forever.
to*pn him who struck down great kings, His*lg love endures forever.
and*pn killed mighty kings— His*lg love endures forever.
Sihon*pn king of the Amorites His*lg love endures forever.
and*pn Og king of Bashan— His*lg love endures forever.
and*pn gave their land as an inheritance, His*lg love endures forever.
an*pn inheritance to his servant Israel. His*lg love endures forever.
He*pn remembered us in our low estate His*lg love endures forever.
and*pn freed us from our enemies. His*lg love endures forever.
He*pn gives food to every creature. His*lg love endures forever.
Give*pn thanks to the God of heaven. His*lg love endures forever.
